repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript is of Ṛgvedprathamāṣṭaka Sāyaṇabhāṣya Vedārthaprakāśa. It begins with 24th varga of the sixth chapter of the prathamāṣṭaka of R̥gveda. On the
folio in the left margin is written vidyātīrtha maheśvaraḥ. It could be name of a scribe or name of the owner. According to the New Catalogus Catalogorum vol.29 p.114 is a preceptor of Sāyaṇa vidyāraṇya.

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol. 03 21-22 Aufrecht Catalogus [p= 1-711] https://sanskritlibrary.org/integratedDictionaries.html

supportDesc.condition: Good. Edges of some folios are broken. Some folios have brown patches. Broken palm leaf with title of the manuscript.

handNote.desc: Accent marks are given. The style of accent marking is Sāmaveda Kauthuma Saṃhitā.

additions.desc: On the front wooden cover number 27 is written in pink pencil.

binding.p: Thick guard folio are used as cover.

listBibl.bibl: Rigveda Samhita with Sayana's Commentary Part 1 N.S. Sontakke, Vaidik Samshodhan Mandala, Tilak Vidyapeeth, Pune. 1933

TEI.text:
iti prathamasya ṣaṣṭhe caturviṁśo varggaḥ atha ṣaṣṭhī atā́riṣma támasāpā́ramásya uṣā ucchanti vayunā kṛṇoti śriye chando na smayate vibhāti
supratīkā saumanasāyājīgaḥ asya naiśasya tamaso ndhakarasya pāraṁ samāptipradeśaṁ atāriṣma uttirṇāsma anantaraṁ ucchanti naiśanta
stathoktaḥ pādāditvādāṣṭamikanighātābhāve ṣāṣṭhikamāmantritādyudāttatvam varanta vṛñ varaṇe vyatyayena śap goṣu sāvekāca iti prāptasya vibhaktyudā
ttatvasya na gośvansāvavarṇeti pratiṣedhaḥ aryaḥ aryasvāmivaiśyayoriti nipātyate aryaḥ svāmyākhyācet ityantodāttatvam maṁhiṣṭhāḥ mahi vṛddhau idittvāt num asmādanta
rbhāvitaṇyarthāt tṛc chandasīti ṣṭhan turiṣṭhemeyasviti tṛclopaḥ sadhamādaḥ mada tṛptiyoge caurādika saha mādayante tṛptā bhavantīti sadhamādaḥ kvipceti kvip sadhamādhasthayośchandasīti sahasya
sadhādeśaḥ iti prathamasyāṣṭame ṣaḍviṁśo varggaḥ
